TextBody:
Hi Sherla,

Thank you for your email.
The activity of the user can be viewed in Reports and Analysys- File tracing tab.
And no,the document itself cannot be downloaded.
But for more on this, please consult the manual here - https://www.endpointprotector.com/support/pdf/manual/Endpoint_Protector_5_User_Manual_EN.pdf page 57/299 chapter 5.7.3

Adrian Stanca
Technical Support Engineer

DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | Enforced Encryption | eDiscovery
Email | Website | LinkedIn
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BhK3a:ref
Subject: Regarding the File tracing    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BhK3a:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BhK3a:ref

Hi Team,

In this document it says that it available for windows system but we are
using Mac laptops. Is this feature available for Mac system can you check
and confirm.

And we want to know what are the things happening in Mac laptop is it
possible can you please check.

Thanks & regards,
S. Vamshi Krishna
Ph No : + 91 9963116463

TextBody:
Hi Vamshi,

If file Shadowing is enabled, it will generate a very small copy of the document on the server indeed.
But it is not an exact  1v1 copy of the document- the file should be reachable from Reports and Analysys- Content Aware Report-a Blue download bar should be present.
If you insist for a call, we can have one, but I am not sure what other information I could provide you with that is not already
in the manual. Have you checked that up?

Adrian Stanca
Technical Support Engineer

DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | Enforced Encryption | eDiscovery
Email | Website | LinkedIn

On Wed, Jun 12, 2024 at 12:29?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Vamshi,

If file Shadowing is enabled, it will generate a very small copy of the document on the server indeed.
But it is not an exact  1v1 copy of the document- the file should be reachable from Reports and Analysys- Content Aware Report-a Blue download bar should be present.
If you insist for a call, we can have one, but I am not sure what other information I could provide you with that is not already
in the manual. Have you checked that up?

Adrian Stanca
Technical Support Engineer

DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | Enforced Encryption | eDiscovery
Email | Website | LinkedIn

Hi Team,
 

In this document it says that it available for windows system but we are using Mac laptops. Is this feature available for Mac system can you check and confirm.

And we want to know what are the things happening in Mac laptop is it possible can you please check.

 






Thanks & regards,

S. Vamshi Krishna

Ph No : + 91 9963116463








 


On Tue, Jun 11, 2024 at 7:06?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Sherla,

Thank you for your email.
The activity of the user can be viewed in Reports and Analysys- File tracing tab.
And no,the document itself cannot be downloaded.
But for more on this, please consult the manual here - https://www.endpointprotector.com/support/pdf/manual/Endpoint_Protector_5_User_Manual_EN.pdf page 57/299 chapter 5.7.3

Adrian Stanca
Technical Support Engineer

DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | Enforced Encryption | eDiscovery
